column3: Write the letter, add the combining diacritic on it, this library will delete it and replace it with a single Unicode letter.
This also reduces the filesize of the letters from 3 to 2 bytes per letter.
Has to be case sensitive with the (C) syntax
Probably has to have the (?) syntax, which will allow it to trigger within words.
